Direct Known Subclasses:
Enemy, Player
public abstract class Character extends com.github.hanyaeger.api.entities.DynamicCompositeEntity implements com.github.hanyaeger.api.entities.Collided, com.github.hanyaeger.api.entities.Collider, com.github.hanyaeger.api.TimerContainer, com.github.hanyaeger.api.entities.SceneBorderTouchingWatcher
Simple class to create moving characters on a scene with collision and border watching

    • Character

      public Character(com.github.hanyaeger.api.Coordinate2D location, int health, GameScreen gameScreen)
      Creates a Character on the scene
      Parameters:
      location - The location on the scene
      health - The start health and the max health of the Character
      gameScreen - The game screen where the character is located

    • die

      protected final void die()
      Lets the character 'die', sets visibility to false. For respawning purposes

    • move

      protected void move(double direction)
      Lets the character move with the given speed of the character. Can be overridden by extending classes
      Parameters:
      direction - In degrees where 0 is down and 180 is up

    • move

      protected void move(com.github.hanyaeger.api.entities.Direction direction)

      Parameters:
      direction - Using the Direction enum for setting direction
